comments.body:
Please use multi line yaml with a `- name:`

Please see http://docs.ansible.com/ansible/dev_guide/developing_modules_documenting.html#examples-block for details

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +90,94 @@Tasks: The following are examples of using the module cnos_vlan. These are written in the main.yml file of the tasks directory.
---
- name: Test Vlan - Create a vlan, name it
  cnos_vlan:
      host: "{{ inventory_hostname }}"
